subject: Order #SSN2802 has this been shipped?
description_text:

conversations.body_text: Hi JAYSON AUTRY,    We apologize for the delayed response; we've just returned from our 8-day holiday. Your order has been shipped, and here is your tracking link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045959529265
